cmput301w15t07.TravelTracker.util

Class DestinationAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301w15t07.TravelTracker.util.DestinationAdapter

  • public class DestinationAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Custom adapter for dealing with displaying and editing destinations dynamically in a LinearLayout.
    Author:
    therabidsquirel

      • createView

        public android.view.View createView(Destination destination,
                           android.content.Context context)
        Given a destination, create a view populated with its information for display in a custom LinearLayout.
        Parameters:
        destination - The destination to create a view for.
        context - The context of the calling activity.
        Returns:
        The newly created view.

      • setDestinationOnView

        public void setDestinationOnView(android.view.View view,
                        Destination destination)
        Given a view, set it with all of the information from a destination. Also set the destination as a tag on the view, so it can be retrieved when needed.
        Parameters:
        view - The view to set.
        destination - The destination to use.

      • getDestinationFromView

        public Destination getDestinationFromView(android.view.View view)
        Get the destination that is stored as a tag in the view.
        Parameters:
        view - The view to get the destination from.
        Returns:
        The destination retrieved from the view.

        public boolean isEditable()
        Check whether elements are editable.
        Returns:
        Whether the elements are currently editable.

        Set whether elements should be editable.
        Parameters:
        editable - Whether elements should be editable.
